name: Phoenix New Media Limited
description: Phoenix New Media Limited is a leading new media company in China that specializes in providing comprehensive content across various platforms, including the internet, mobile, and television. Founded in 2005, the company operates several well-known brands, including ifeng.com, which is one of the largest online news portals in China. Phoenix New Media focuses on delivering high-quality news, entertainment, and lifestyle content to its audience, leveraging advanced technology to enhance user experience. The company emphasizes user engagement and is committed to offering a diverse range of services, including live video broadcasts, mobile applications, and digital advertising solutions. In recent years, Phoenix New Media has also invested in video content production and distribution, further solidifying its position in the rapidly evolving digital landscape. With a mission to empower its users through timely and relevant information, Phoenix New Media continues to adapt its strategies to meet the changing demands of consumers and the increasing competition in the digital media sector.

seo.meta_title: Phoenix New Media Limited | Leading New Media Company in China
seo.meta_description: Explore Phoenix New Media Limited, a top provider of digital content and news in China. Discover their innovative services and commitment to quality information.

faq.question: What is Phoenix New Media known for?
faq.answer: Phoenix New Media is known for its comprehensive online news services and digital content across various platforms.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Phoenix New Media?
faq.answer: Sheng Li is the CEO of Phoenix New Media Limited.

faq.question: Where is Phoenix New Media headquartered?
faq.answer: Phoenix New Media is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: What are the main products of Phoenix New Media?
faq.answer: The main products include ifeng.com, mobile news applications, and various video content services.

faq.question: When was Phoenix New Media founded?
faq.answer: Phoenix New Media was founded in 2005.
